definition: Kailu county in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
Kailu county in Tongliao 通遼|通辽[Tong1 liao2], Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Kailu Basin is a volcanic rock basin of continental facies.
sentences.chinese: 開魯盆地爲陸相火山岩盆地。

sentences.english: Kyruk stood atop the gate and surveyed the carnage below.
sentences.chinese: 開魯可站在城門上觀察着腳下的戰場。

sentences.english: Immature oil has been explored and exploited in the eastern sag of Kailu Basin, Inner Mongolia, China.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古開魯盆地陸東凹陷發現了大量低熟石油。
